text: adequate public education rulemaking alternative programs for granting credit leading to graduation amend rsa v b to read as follows b the state board of education shall adopt rules pursuant to rsa relative to the approval of alternative programs for granting credit leading to graduation schools shall accept credits required for high school graduation consistent with the rules of the state board upon receiving a valid completion certificate from a state board approved alternative program a high school as defined in rsa shall grant equivalent high school credit leading to graduation to a student who has completed such alternative program
